name: Pappas walking sim
description:
i hope you guys like the game, i dont but plz like and download share with some mates. it not meant to be a full game but if people share and it gets some real likes, i will go for a better second one that actually feels like a game.

the main idea is that you the player, walk, read and laugh your way through stupid jokes in an odd city setting, the concept was reality where things like Godzilla living in our reality and what if 911 didn't happen, or if star wars was real.
